title: All Purpose Cat Girl Nuku Nuku TV
alternative_title: Bannou Bunka Neko-Musume (1998), 万能文化猫娘
description: * Alternate telling of the OVA... with a twist.After starting out in a new school and meeting her rather zany classmates, Nuku Nuku is forced into fighting the dangerous (read as "absurd") robots of the Mishima corporation's inner circle (all in the most ridiculous costumes since Kishin Heidan), led by the evil mastermind (read as "blithering-idiot-in-the-goofiest-costume-of-all"), Hell Mishima. Their plan? Why, to take over the world, of course!
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
